MemberSignature.Usage: Android.Opengl.Matrix.MultiplyMM (result, resultOffset, lhs, lhsOffset, rhs, rhsOffset)

Docs.param: The float array that holds the result.
The offset into the result array where the result is stored.
The float array that holds the left-hand-side matrix.
The offset into the lhs array where the lhs is stored
The float array that holds the right-hand-side matrix.
The offset into the rhs array where the rhs is stored.
Docs.summary: Multiplies two 4x4 matrices together and stores the result in a third 4x4 matrix.

Docs.exception: if result, lhs, or rhs are null, or if resultOffset + 16 > result.length or lhsOffset + 16 > lhs.length or rhsOffset + 16 > rhs.length.

MemberSignature.Usage: Android.Opengl.Matrix.MultiplyMV (resultVec, resultVecOffset, lhsMat, lhsMatOffset, rhsVec, rhsVecOffset)

Docs.param: The float array that holds the result vector.
The offset into the result array where the result vector is stored.
The float array that holds the left-hand-side matrix.
The offset into the lhs array where the lhs is stored
The float array that holds the right-hand-side vector.
The offset into the rhs vector where the rhs vector is stored.
Docs.summary: Multiplies a 4 element vector by a 4x4 matrix and stores the result in a 4-element column vector.

Docs.exception: if resultVec, lhsMat, or rhsVec are null, or if resultVecOffset + 4 > resultVec.length or lhsMatOffset + 16 > lhsMat.length or rhsVecOffset + 4 > rhsVec.length.
